string.value: A Public Phone has been placed in every town.\r\nThe phone is ringing... Should you answer?
You picked up the phone and was connected with someone on the other line.
You must meet #b#p9250121##k, who is hidden in every town. Remember the formula: #rΔt = [ Δt0 ] / [ root{ 1 - ( v/c )^2} ]#k that #b#p9250125##k mentioned.

Who is this!?

#k

#k

(The hear nothing on the other end of the line.)

(You dial 0555.) 
Hello? Oh good. You are on an OSSS secure connection now. So you want to help defeat the aliens, do you?
#L0##bWho the heck are you?#l
#k
Allow me to introduce myself. I am #p9250125##k, Chief Scientist of the OSSS Secret Base Laboratory.\r\n#L0##bYou're a scientist? Are all scientists as rude as you?#l\n#k

Ah, my apologies about that. I will explain everything to you when you meet me in person at the Secret Base.
Now, find my contact, who should be in town with you. The contact will be disguised in filthy clothes.
#L0##b(What? Like a bum? Great disguise...)#l
#k
When you hang up, you will find a coin in the change slot. Bring that coin to the contact.\r\n#b(The bum... Right. Got it.)
